name: Animal Crossing: Look and See
description:
Saw the Animal Crossing merch from the Tokyo store.

Thought it'd be really cool to have it be interactable.

Tried my best, then gave up. Voila!

Click and drag to move. Tap objects to interact. Scroll to zoom in/out.

Sounds:
